Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Value: This Workflow retrieves employee IDs, queries Sage 300 People for each employeeâ€™s details, maps and formats the data, and then creates employee records in PaySpace. Success or error status for each employee creation is logged using key-value pairs.

Properties.Description:
Retrieves the required information for an employee in the system. 

The unique identifier of the Employee ID is used in the URL and therefore no Body Details required.

Properties.Name: Action
Properties.Value: Biographical / Create a single employee record

Name: Sage 300 People to PaySpace Employees
Description: This Workflow retrieves employee IDs, queries Sage 300 People for each employeeâ€™s details, maps and formats the data, and then creates employee records in PaySpace. Success or error status for each employee creation is logged using key-value pairs.
